title: Peak online shopping hours of U.S. consumers 2015
summary: Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is slightly decreasing from 4-9_PM to 7-11_AM, and finally slightly increasing from 7-11_AM to 9_PM_-_2_AM.
The line drastically decreased by 4.8 times from Year 4-9_PM to 7-11_AM.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 4-9_PM and 7-11_AM.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 48.0 was reached at Year 4-9_PM
Minimum Share of respondents about 10.0 was reached at Year 7-11_AM
